PROGRESS_DATA.description: Survive 10 minutes in An Old Mad Forest.
Survive 15 minutes in A Rough Awakening.
Open the coffin in Risky Woods.
Defeat a Jiva Tree in Rotten Orchard.
Find the coffin in A Rough Awakening.
Evolve the Vento Sacro or find the Fuwalafuwaloo.
Survive for 10 minutes in Chapel Catastrophe.
Find the Empty Tome and evolve the Magic Wand.
Open Pugnala Provola's coffin in Quickdraw Rebel.
Open Krochi Freeto's coffin in Chromatic Carnage.
Evolve and unite Phiera Der Tuphello and Eight The Sparrow.
Defeat The Ender in Cappella Magna.
Open Suor Clerici's coffin in Chapel Catastrophe.
Find the King Bible in Chapel Catastrophe.
Open Giovanna Grana's coffin in the Inlaid Library.
Find the Song of Mana in Gallo Tower.
Enter the magic mirror on the left and open Concetta Caciotta's Coffin in Gallo Tower.
Find Phiera Der Tuphello in Astral Stair.
Find Eight The Sparrow in Astral Stair.
Open Yatta Cavallo's coffin in Astral Stair.
Open Zi'Assunta's coffin in Capella Magna.
Open the coffin in Ice Age.
Open the coffin in Ice Cream.
Open the coffin in A Fiery Apparition.
Open the coffin in A Pure Heart.
Open the coffin in Shrine Valley.
Open the coffin in Forbidden Peaks.
Defeat Megalo Syuuto in the Hidden Cave.
Defeat a total of 3000 Madd-Onnas in Frozen Lake.
With Rottin'Ghoul, help Genevieve evolve the Shadow Servant in "The World Eater" .
With Luminaire, evolve the Prismatic Missile in "The Guardian of the Lake" before the time limit.
With Keira, reach Level 30 in "The Sly Swashbuckler".
With Viktor, reach Level 30 in "The Undefeated Champion".
With Eleanor, reach Level 30 in "The Star Pupil".
With a party of Eleanor, Viktor, and Keitha, survive 30 minutes in "Tides of the Foscari".
Survive the judgement of the Avatar of Gaea.
Find the forbidden coffin in "Tides of the Foscari".
With the true horror, devour everything in "The True Horror".
Find the Engineer in Suspect Security.
Find the Ghost in Don't Get Ghosted.
Find the Scientist in Space Rocks.
Defeat the Suspicious Eyes in Test Tube Trouble.
Evolve Sharp Tongue, or aquire its evolution.
Evolve Clear Debris, or aquire its evolution.
Survive for 20 minutes in Meeting Called.
Reach level 80 in Test Tube Trouble.
Find and destroy the Metal Alien in Attack Aggressively.
Survive for 15 minutes in Bullet Biters.
Defeat the M78 after 10 minutes in Neo City Chaos.
Defeat Big Bot Gordea after 10 minutes in Operation: Gun City.
Find a new ally in Run & Gun.
Defeat Taka after 15 minutes in Alien Revengeance.
Survive for 20 minutes in Attack Agressively.
Defeat Big Fuzz in the Northeast of Neo City.
Find Probotector in Run and Gun.
Rescue Lama in Neo City Chaos.
Rescue Dommario in Operation: Gun City.
Reach Level 20 in the Devious Woods.
Reach Level 40 in the Entrance Corridor.
Reach Level 60 in the Long Library.
Reach Level 80 in the Clock Tower.
Defeat the Brachyura in the Sunken City.
Evolve the Clock Lancet with Maria in the Sunken City.
Survive for 1 minute in Devious Woods.
Defeat Behemoth at 25 minutes in Devious Woods.
Defeat Carmilla at 25 minutes in the Entrance Corridor.
Defeat the Creature at 25 minutes in the Long Library.
Defeat Malphas at 25 minutes in the Clock Tower.
Defeat Succubus at 25 minutes in the Throne Rooms.
Defeat Jiang Shi at 15 minutes in Ecclesia.
Wield the Alchemy Whip with Richter at 25 minutes in the Throne Rooms to defeat the final foe.
Find a Stone Mask in the Entrance Corridor.
Find an Empty Tome in the Long Library.
Find a Clock Lancet in the Clock Tower.
Find a Tirajisu in the Throne Room.
Find and open the coffin in the Devious Woods.
Find and open the coffin in the Entrance Corridor.
Find and open the coffin in the Long Library.

Defeat the Treant in the Devious Woods.
Defeat the Phantom Bat in the Entrance Corridor.
Defeat the Giant Medusa Head in the Long Library.
